## LoggerLogCreator

<div id="jstree-container"></div>

## Permission Set attributes

|<!-- -->|<!-- -->|
|:---|:---|
|Label|Nebula Logger: Log Creator|
|Description|Provides explicit access to metadata needed to generate (but not access) logging data. This typically is not needed - but in some situations it's required, such as logging in lightning components within an Experience Cloud site.|
